languages.text: "Благодарю за готовность помочь, Лорд-капитан. Я уверен, что все обвинения ложные, и буду благодарен за вашу помощь в их разоблачении. Думаю, вам стоит поговорить со всеми присутствующими здесь... знатными дамами и господами".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю за готовность помочь, Лорд-капитан. Я уверен, что все обвинения ложные, и буду благодарен за вашу помощь в их разоблачении. Думаю, вам стоит поговорить со всеми присутствующими здесь... знатными дамами и господами".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за готовность помочь, Лорд-капитан. Я уверен, что все обвинения ложные, и буду благодарен за вашу помощь в их разоблачении. Думаю, вам стоит поговорить со всеми присутствующими здесь... знатными дамами и господами".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am sure that all of the accusations are false and would be grateful for your help in exposing them. I think you should speak to... all the aristocrats that are present here."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am sure that all of the accusations are false and would be grateful for your help in exposing them. I think you should speak to... all the aristocrats that are present here."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「助力いただけるとのこと、感謝いたします、ロード・キャプテン。この告訴がすべて偽りなのは間違いありません。すべてを明らかにする上で、お力添えいただけるとはありがたい限りです。その場にいる全員に話すべきでしょう…気高き諸侯や淑女たちに」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."

traits.locale_text: 「助力いただけるとのこと、感謝いたします、ロード・キャプテン。この告訴がすべて偽りなのは間違いありません。すべてを明らかにする上で、お力添えいただけるとはありがたい限りです。その場にいる全員に話すべきでしょう…気高き諸侯や淑女たちに」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “感谢您出手相助，舰长大人。我敢保证，厄本的一切指控纯属无中生有。如果您能帮助我们伸冤，我们都将感激不尽。我想您应该和……在场的每位贵族成员谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."

traits.locale_text: “感谢您出手相助，舰长大人。我敢保证，厄本的一切指控纯属无中生有。如果您能帮助我们伸冤，我们都将感激不尽。我想您应该和……在场的每位贵族成员谈谈。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il ne fait aucun doute que ces accusations sont montées de toute pièce, mais pour faire toute la lumière sur cette affaire, votre aide sera des plus précieuses. Vous devriez sans doute parler à toutes les personnes en présence... ces nobles seigneurs et dames. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il ne fait aucun doute que ces accusations sont montées de toute pièce, mais pour faire toute la lumière sur cette affaire, votre aide sera des plus précieuses. Vous devriez sans doute parler à toutes les personnes en présence... ces nobles seigneurs et dames. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por la ayuda, Lord Capitán. No me cabe duda de que las acusaciones son falsas y agradecería su ayuda para que esto salga a la luz. Creo que debería hablar con todos los presentes... con nuestros nobles señores y damas».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la ayuda, Lord Capitán. No me cabe duda de que las acusaciones son falsas y agradecería su ayuda para que esto salga a la luz. Creo que debería hablar con todos los presentes... con nuestros nobles señores y damas».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für Eure Bereitschaft zu helfen, Lord Captain. Ich bin sicher, sämtliche Vorwürfe falsch sind, und wäre dankbar für Eure Hilfe, sie als solche zu entlarven. Ich denke, Ihr solltet mit allen Anwesenden sprechen ... den noblen Lords und Ladys."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Eure Bereitschaft zu helfen, Lord Captain. Ich bin sicher, dass all diese Anschuldigungen erfunden sind, und wäre dankbar für Eure Hilfe dabei, sie zu klären. Ich denke, Ihr solltet mit ... allen anwesenden Aristokraten sprechen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Yardım etme hevesiniz için minnettarım Lord Kaptan. Tüm ithamların asılsız olduğuna şüphem yok, bunu kanıtlamak için yardımınızı esirgemezseniz müteşekkir olurum. Mevcut her soylu lord ve leydiyle konuşmanız tavsiyemdir."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your willingness to help, Lord Captain. I am certain that all the charges are false and I would be grateful for your help in exposing them as such. I think you should speak to everyone present... the noble lords and ladies."

traits.locale_text: "Yardım etme hevesiniz için minnettarım Lord Kaptan. Tüm ithamların asılsız olduğundan şüphem yok, bunu kanıtlamak için yardımınızı esirgemezseniz müteşekkir olurum. Mevcut herkesle... soylu lordlar ve leydilerle konuşmanız tavsiyemdir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
